channel.title: [PI] Npc drops
channel.description:
So i'm trying to add some drops to a few spiders in my server.
[code]#Jungle Spider 60:100 5301:20 5302:20 5303:15 5304:15 #Spider 60:100 5291:30 5292:30 5293:30 5294:25 5295:20 5296:20 5297:20 5298:20 5299:15 5300:15 5301:10 5302:5 5303:5 5304:5 [/code]
They don't drop anything, at all
When I change it to: [code]#Jungle Spider 60:100 5301:20 5302:20 5303:15 5304:15 #Spider 60:100 5291:30 5292:30 5293:30 5294:25 5295:20 5296:20 5297:20 5298:20 5299:15 5300:15 5301:10 5302:5 5303:5 5304:5 [/code]
The drops come, but after a few kills the server crashes... Help?
EDIT:
[code][8/4/12 1:30 PM]: [REGISTERED]: Dro [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:1511) [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 1245) [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:156) [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: Saved game for Dro. [8/4/12 1:31 PM]: Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [PI] Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[8/4/12 1:31 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:1511)

post your dropitems void

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @bluur3 bluur3
item.description:
@bluur3 wrote:

[quote=“Trade Me, post:6, topic:452832”]AAAH!!!
smh
Surprised i didn’t notice this the first time.
You can put the npc and the drops on separate lines.
So maybe try this:
Makes sure it’s still all tabbed…

#Jungle Spider 60:100 5301:20 5302:20 5303:15 5304:15 #Spider 60:100 5291:30 5292:30 5293:30 5294:25 5295:20 5296:20 5297:20 5298:20 5299:15 5300:15 5301:10 5302:5 5303:5 5304:5[/quote]

Yes, I’ve tried that, and wen I put it that way nothing drops.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

AAAH!!!
smh
Surprised i didn’t notice this the first time.
You can put the npc and the drops on separate lines.
So maybe try this:
Makes sure it’s still all tabbed…

#Jungle Spider 60:100 5301:20 5302:20 5303:15 5304:15 #Spider 60:100 5291:30 5292:30 5293:30 5294:25 5295:20 5296:20 5297:20 5298:20 5299:15 5300:15 5301:10 5302:5 5303:5 5304:5
